Author: Liquid_Is_A_Paper
Text: I mean, technically you did. It was your body's voice, saying "I NEED AND DESERVE FOOD PLS".  I know that the idea of food is scary (trust me lol, I *know*), but when your stomach is acting like that to that extent, try to eat something small and nutritious. A protein-filled snack, for example. Peas. Some cheese. Hell, if you're willing to wait a bit, cooking a small amount of chicken would be great.   Tbh, just something to help prevent harm. Starvation is no joke, and taking steps to minimize the harm that this horrific disorder can cause will benefit you in the short and long term.
